examples: Mrs. Glegg had on her fuzziest front, and garments which appeared to have had a recent resurrection from rather a creasy form of burial;

entries.meaning: (mainly Southern US) Denoting any of several related species of edible, commonly wild, greens, especially upland cress or winter cress.
examples: Creasy greens are amazingly versatile when it comes to brightening up winter fare. You can try them in any recipe that calls for watercress or cooked spinach.
